name: tm08
effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rock Smash Gen I: Body Slam)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK & DEFENSE.
flavor_text.emerald: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK & DEFENSE.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user bulks up its body to boost both its ATTACK and DEFENSE stats.
